# unit

**Instance Property**

If the `unit` field contains a value not in the `AudioUnitParameterUnit` enumeration, then assume the unit type is `kAudioUnitParameterUnit_Generic`.

## Declaration

```swift
var unit: AudioUnitParameterUnit
```
title: unit
